name: The Old Dark House (Kristofer Stevenson, jkelly, KLewis)
name_original: The Old Dark House (Kristofer Stevenson, jkelly, KLewis)
description:
The Old Dark House is a short narrative game based on JB Priestley's 1927 novel Benighted.

Roger Penderel is driving through the mountains of Wales when a torrential downpour washes away the road and forces him to seek shelter for the night. He takes refuge in an ancient, crumbling mansion inhabited by the strange and sinister Femm family and their brutish servant Morgan.

The Old Dark House was developed by:

  • Kristofer Stevenson - Lead Gameplay Programmer & Additional Gameplay Designer
  • Steven Benson - Lead 3D Modeller
  • jkelly - Lead Technical Artist & Level Designer
  • KLewis - Lead Gameplay & Narrative Designer

Minimum system requirements

Operating System: Windows 10 Version 18362.0 or higher

CPU: Intel Core i3-4170 or better

GPU: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 or better

HDD: 1 GB free space

RAM: 8 GB

VRAM: 6 GB
